timeline.description:

Processing:

- Drying: Solar-dried at 30°C for 96 hours (Final Moisture: 7.5%)
- Grinding: N/A

Quality & Safety:
- Inspection: Excellent color and aroma. No foreign matter detected.

Storage & Dispatch:
- Stored for 5 days in Climate-controlled warehouse
